database: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION timestamp_ceil(_tstz timestamptz, _int_seconds int) RETURNS timestamptz AS $func$ SELECT to_timestamp(ceil(extract(epoch FROM $1) / $2) * $2) $func$  LANGUAGE sql STABLE;
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION timestamp_ceil(_tstz timestamptz, _interval interval) RETURNS timestamptz LANGUAGE sql STABLE AS 'SELECT timestamp_ceil($1, extract(epoch FROM $2)::int)';
